entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries over southern sections overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries over southern sections early in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 70 percent chance of light snow before morning. Occasional drifting snow. Wind east 30 km/h except 50 near the Richardson mountains overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 28 April 2023
